trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the required quantity of the material is in stock.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether the required quantity of the material is in stock.

target.mrk: 指定物料的所需存货数量。

trans-unit.source: The availability of the spare parts that you require is of utmost importance for planning your repair work.

seg-source.mrk: The availability of the spare parts that you require is of utmost importance for planning your repair work.

target.mrk: 您所需要的备件可用性是计划维修工作的最重要部分。

trans-unit.source: You decide which spare parts you require for the repair work. You can use plus and minus buttons to increase or decrease the quantity of the required material. The system displays whether the quantity of the material you require is available in the appropriate plant/storage location.

seg-source.mrk: You decide which spare parts you require for the repair work.
You can use plus and minus buttons to increase or decrease the quantity of the required material.
The system displays whether the quantity of the material you require is available in the appropriate plant/storage location.

target.mrk: 决定修复工作所需的备件。
使用“加”和“减”按钮增加或减少所需物料数量。
系统显示所需的物料数量是否在合适的工厂/库存位置提供。

trans-unit.source: Apart from purchase orders and reservations, this availability check also takes into account requirements from sales documents as well as requirements resulting from delivery notes.

seg-source.mrk: Apart from purchase orders and reservations, this availability check also takes into account requirements from sales documents as well as requirements resulting from delivery notes.

target.mrk: 除订购单和预留外，此可用性检查还会考虑销售凭证中的要求以及交货单中的要求。

trans-unit.source: If you search in the bill of material, the system performs the availability check for the plant that has been defined for this bill of material.

seg-source.mrk: If you search in the bill of material, the system performs the availability check for the plant that has been defined for this bill of material.

target.mrk: 如果在物料清单中进行搜索，则系统会针对已为此物料清单定义的工厂执行可用性检查。

trans-unit.source: If you enter a preferred storage location in the <cite>Personalization </cite> app on the tab page <cite>EAMS Web UI</cite>, these values are used as default filter values for the storage location and plant in the <cite>Report and Repair Malfunction </cite> app. This means that the system would then also perform the availability check using the bill of material based on your preferred storage location.

seg-source.mrk: If you enter a preferred storage location in the <cite>Personalization </cite> app on the tab page <cite>EAMS Web UI</cite>, these values are used as default filter values for the storage location and plant in the <cite>Report and Repair Malfunction </cite> app.
This means that the system would then also perform the availability check using the bill of material based on your preferred storage location.

target.mrk: 如果在 <cite>EAMS Web UI</cite> 标签页上的<cite>个性化设置</cite>应用中输入了首选库存位置，则这些值会用作<cite>报告和维修故障</cite>应用中的库存位置和工厂的缺省过滤值。
这表示系统还会根据首选库存位置使用物料清单执行可用性检查。
